speaker: gumball
dialog: I've trapped us inside a video game.

speaker: darwin
dialog: Please tell me what has been going on.

speaker: anais
dialog: A foul curse has been released by Gumball.

speaker: darwin
dialog: You mean the gates of doom were opened by Gumball.

speaker: anais
dialog: The fabric of the universe was ripped apart by Gumball.

speaker: darwin
dialog: Gumball has made quite a mess.

speaker: darwin
dialog: Looks like we will need to defeat the main boss to escape.

speaker: anais
dialog: Look at your console and navigate through.

speaker: anais
dialog: To switch between us you must move left <- and right -> when looking at our names.

speaker: anais
dialog: To attack go to the bottom of the menu and press attack.

speaker: anais
dialog: We will be obtaining items to use later on so keep an eye on that.
